321690.name: Movie Edit Pro 2015 - Movie Templates
321690.description: Get your recordings ready for Hollywood with the Movie Wizard and the included animated movie templates. Choose your favorites from a variety of styles and categories, such as vacation, party or New Year's Eve. Each of the 30 movie templates include placeholders for your videos, photos and texts, which you can use to customize your movie.
321690.supported_languages:
德语*, 英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 荷兰语*, 芬兰语, 俄语, 瑞典语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
